# cell

**Instance Property**

The receiver’s cell object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var cell: NSCell? { get set }
```

## Discussion

For controls with multiple cells (such as `NSMatrix` or `NSForm`), use the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControl/selectedCell()] property to retrieve a specific cell.

## Deprecated Properties

- **cellClass**: Returns the type of cell used by the receiver.

items.description: Returns the type of cell used by the receiver.
